overview: The immersive exhibition takes you on a journey of discovery of the artistic and architectural treasures of the city of Venice.  As you explore the Grand Canal and the canals, lanes, squares, buildings, and churches, embark on a journey through Venetian interiors and exteriors—both holy and secular—in search of the visible symbols of the city’s extraordinary history.  For around forty minutes, you will be immersed in Byzantine art and the impressive golden mosaics of Saint Mark’s Basilica, the masterpieces of Tintoretto, Bellini, and Canaletto, and the famous Mostra del Cinema, with photos of theactresses and actors of Italian neorealist films.
title: Venise la Sérénissime
